headlines.description: Liverpool earned a hard-fought 1-0 win against Burnley at Turf Moor on Sunday to keep their title hopes alive.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool keep title race alive with win at Burnley

headlines.description: — Kieran Trippier scored from a free kick for the second time in six days to fire Newcastle to a 1-0 win over Aston Villa and a third straight Premier League victory on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trippier's free kick helps Newcastle to 3rd straight EPL win

headlines.description: Tottenham's bid for the top four stumbled on Sunday following a 2-0 home defeat to Wolves.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs' top four bid dented with Wolves defeat

events.name: West Ham United at Leicester City

headlines.description: West Ham United defender Craig Dawson's stoppage-time equaliser ensured Leicester City's frustrating season continued in a 2-2 draw.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dawson snatches West Ham dramatic last-gasp point at Leicester
